explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of a machine learning allocation methodology called Nested Clustered Optimization (NCO).
explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper discusses the use of spectral clustering algorithm and Minimum Spanning Tree (MST), which are techniques commonly associated with unsupervised learning.
explanations.clustering: The paper involves hierarchical clustering techniques and spectral clustering algorithm as part of the modified NCO methodology.
